events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position on the careers portal.
Application was reviewed and correctly categorized under the Engineering department focusing on software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The recruiter conducted a detailed phone screening to evaluate the candidateâ€™s experience with software engineering principles.
Candidate replied enthusiastically confirming availability for the upcoming technical interviews and expressed strong interest.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the lead software engineer for next week as per candidate and interviewer availability.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving.
HR interview scheduled following a positive technical evaluation to discuss cultural fit and employment terms.
HR interview went well; candidate showed alignment with company values and communicated clear expectations.
An official software engineer offer was proposed, outlining salary, benefits, and role expectations.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer, appreciating the transparency and competitive compensation package.
Candidate formally accepted the offer and agreed to the start date proposed by the HR team.
The new hire initiated the onboarding process, completing all required documentation and introductory trainings.
The hiring process is officially closed with the successful integration of the candidate into the engineering team.
